LBE Security Master Services launched an independent anti-theft module for your phone with the best anti-theft protection. LBE Security Master Anti-Theft Service can provide you with the following functions: mobile phone positioning, data destruction, data backup, anti-theft alarm, virtual warnings The first time you use LBE security service, please download and install the LBE Security Master Anti-Theft Service Module

ROOT installation mode of LBE Security Master Service installs as a system component so it can not be easily uninstalled. Even if your phone is restored the factory settings, LBE security service can still work properly to protect your phone.

System-level telephone intercept feature requires you to enable Proactive Defense before use. Phone intercept system level has the highest priority, which can effectively avoid the call, reject and /or beep. However, the current system-level telephone intercept feature only supports some models. If your phone is unable to use this feature correctly, please turn it off
